dt: {bc}the central room of a Roman house
{bc}a rectangular open patio around which a house is built
{bc}a many-storied court in a building (such as a hotel) usually with a skylight
{bc}the chamber or either of the chambers of the heart that receives blood from the veins and forces it into the ventricle or ventricles {dx}see {dxt|heart|heart|illustration}{/dx}

shortdef: the central room of a Roman house
a rectangular open patio around which a house is built
a many-storied court in a building (such as a hotel) usually with a skylight
